com.rubynaxela.teaeditor.util

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rubynaxela.teaeditor.util.Utils

  • public final class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    The Utils class provides a number of unclassified utility functions that are used in different places throughout the project
    Author:
    Jacek Pawelski

      • dialogElementPosition

        @Nonnull
public static java.awt.GridBagConstraints dialogElementPosition(int row,
                                                                         int column,
                                                                         int width)
        Returns a GridBagConstraints object with properties suitable for a dialog pane:
        • row and column parameters translate directly into gridy and gridx fields of the returned object respectively
        • the width parameter translates to GridBagConstraints.gridwidth field of the returned object, which means it will take up space of that much grid columns
        Parameters:
        row - vertical position in the grid
        column - horizontal position in the grid
        width - determines the component width (in columns)
        Returns:
        a GridBagConstraints instance

      • dialogElementPosition

        @Nonnull
public static java.awt.GridBagConstraints dialogElementPosition(int row,
                                                                         int column)
        Returns a GridBagConstraints object where row and column parameters translate directly into gridy and gridx fields of the returned object respectively
        Parameters:
        row - vertical position in the grid
        column - horizontal position in the grid
        Returns:
        a GridBagConstraints instance

      • stringPlaceholder

        @Deprecated
public static java.lang.String stringPlaceholder(int lines)
        Deprecated. 
        Used to allocate a concrete amount of space for a label while a dialog layout is initialized
        Parameters:
        lines - the maximal expected number of lines that the label will take up
        Returns:
        a placeholder html text consisting of invisible characters
        See Also:
        INCDataDialogPanel, TeaBoxDialogPanel
